TEXT.TITLE: INVESTMENT FIRM HAS 5.3 PCT OF BLASIUS <BLAS.O>
TEXT.BODY: Fidelity International Ltd, a Bermuda-based investment advisory firm, and an affiliated investment firm, American Values III N.V., said they have acquired 208,000 share of Blasius Industries Inc. In a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, the group said it bought the stake, which amounts to 5.3 pct of the total outstanding common stock, to acquire an equity interest in the company for investment purposes. The group said it may raise its stake or sell some or all of it, and has no plans to seek control of the company. Reuter
